2.label: Power, energy detection mode
2.description: For parameters of 101 ~ 103, power, energy detection mode configuration

3.label: Selective reporting
3.description: Enable selective reporting only when power change reaches a certain threshold or percentage set in 4-11 below. This is used to reduce network traffic.

4.label: Wattage Threshold Whole HEM
4.description: Threshold change in wattage to induce a automatic report (whole HEM).

5.label: Wattage Threshold C1
5.description: Threshold change in wattage to induce a automatic report (Clamp 1).

6.label: Wattage Threshold C2
6.description: Threshold change in wattage to induce a automatic report (Clamp 2).

7.label: Wattage Threshold C3
7.description: Threshold change in wattage to induce a automatic report (Clamp 3).

8.label: Wattage Percentage Change Whole HEM
8.description: Percentage change in wattage to induce a automatic report (whole HEM).

9.label: Wattage Percentage Change C1
9.description: Percentage change in wattage to induce a automatic report (Clamp 1).

10.label: Wattage Percentage Change C2
10.description: Percentage change in wattage to induce a automatic report (Clamp 2).

11.label: Wattage Percentage Change C3
11.description: Percentage change in wattage to induce a automatic report (Clamp 3).

100.label: Reset #101-103
100.description: Reset to default parameters number 101-103. Any value other then 0 will initiate this reset.

101.label: Group 1 Reports
101.description:
Which reports need to send in group1. Format is as follows:
				Byte 1 (msb):
				Bit 7: Reserved
				Bit 6: Reserved
				Bit 5: Auto Send Meter Report (for kVar) at the group time interval (Clamp 3)
				Bit 4: Auto Send Meter Report (for kVar) at the group time interval (Clamp 2)
				Bit 3: Auto Send Meter Report (for kVar) at the group time interval (Clamp 1)
				Bit 2: Auto Send Meter Report (for KVah) at the group time interval (Clamp 3)
				Bit 1: Auto Send Meter Report (for KVah) at the group time interval (Clamp 2)
				Bit 0: Auto Send Meter Report (for KVah) at the group time interval (Clamp 1)
				Byte 2:
				Bit 7: Reserved
				Bit 6: Reserved
				Bit 5: Auto Send Meter Report (for A) at the group time interval (Clamp 3)
				Bit 4: Auto Send Meter Report (for A) at the group time interval (Clamp 2)
				Bit 3: Auto Send Meter Report (for A) at the group time interval (Clamp 1)
				Bit 2: Auto Send Meter Report (for V) at the group time interval (Clamp 3)
				Bit 1: Auto Send Meter Report (for V) at the group time interval (Clamp 2)
				Bit 0: Auto Send Meter Report (for V) at the group time interval (Clamp 1)
				Byte 3:
				Bit 7: Reserved
				Bit 6: Reserved
				Bit 5: Auto Send Meter Report (for kWh) at the group time interval (Clamp 3)
				Bit 4: Auto Send Meter Report (for kWh) at the group time interval (Clamp 2)
				Bit 3: Auto Send Meter Report (for kWh) at the group time interval (Clamp 1)
				Bit 2: Auto Send Meter Report (for Watt) at the group time interval (Clamp 3)
				Bit 1: Auto Send Meter Report (for Watt) at the group time interval (Clamp 2)
				Bit 0: Auto Send Meter Report (for Watt) at the group time interval (Clamp 1)
				Byte 4 (lsb):
				Bit 7: Reserved
				Bit 6: Reserved
				Bit 5: Auto Send Meter Report (for kVar) at the group time interval (Whole HEM)
				Bit 4: Auto Send Meter Report (for KVah) at the group time interval (Whole HEM)
				Bit 3: Auto Send Meter Report (for A) at the group time interval (Whole HEM)
				Bit 2: Auto Send Meter Report (for V) at the group time interval (Whole HEM)
				Bit 1: Auto Send Meter Report (for Watt) at the group time interval (Whole HEM)
				Bit 0: Auto Send Meter Report (for kWh) at the group time interval (Whole HEM)

102.label: Group 2 Reports
102.description:
Which reports need to send in group2. Format is as follows:
				Byte 1 (msb):
				Bit 7: Reserved
				Bit 6: Reserved
				Bit 5: Auto Send Meter Report (for kVar) at the group time interval (Clamp 3)
				Bit 4: Auto Send Meter Report (for kVar) at the group time interval (Clamp 2)
				Bit 3: Auto Send Meter Report (for kVar) at the group time interval (Clamp 1)
				Bit 2: Auto Send Meter Report (for KVah) at the group time interval (Clamp 3)
				Bit 1: Auto Send Meter Report (for KVah) at the group time interval (Clamp 2)
				Bit 0: Auto Send Meter Report (for KVah) at the group time interval (Clamp 1)
				Byte 2:
				Bit 7: Reserved
				Bit 6: Reserved
				Bit 5: Auto Send Meter Report (for A) at the group time interval (Clamp 3)
				Bit 4: Auto Send Meter Report (for A) at the group time interval (Clamp 2)
				Bit 3: Auto Send Meter Report (for A) at the group time interval (Clamp 1)
				Bit 2: Auto Send Meter Report (for V) at the group time interval (Clamp 3)
				Bit 1: Auto Send Meter Report (for V) at the group time interval (Clamp 2)
				Bit 0: Auto Send Meter Report (for V) at the group time interval (Clamp 1)
				Byte 3:
				Bit 7: Reserved
				Bit 6: Reserved
				Bit 5: Auto Send Meter Report (for kWh) at the group time interval (Clamp 3)
				Bit 4: Auto Send Meter Report (for kWh) at the group time interval (Clamp 2)
				Bit 3: Auto Send Meter Report (for kWh) at the group time interval (Clamp 1)
				Bit 2: Auto Send Meter Report (for Watt) at the group time interval (Clamp 3)
				Bit 1: Auto Send Meter Report (for Watt) at the group time interval (Clamp 2)
				Bit 0: Auto Send Meter Report (for Watt) at the group time interval (Clamp 1)
				Byte 4 (lsb):
				Bit 7: Reserved
				Bit 6: Reserved
				Bit 5: Auto Send Meter Report (for kVar) at the group time interval (Whole HEM)
				Bit 4: Auto Send Meter Report (for KVah) at the group time interval (Whole HEM)
				Bit 3: Auto Send Meter Report (for A) at the group time interval (Whole HEM)
				Bit 2: Auto Send Meter Report (for V) at the group time interval (Whole HEM)
				Bit 1: Auto Send Meter Report (for Watt) at the group time interval (Whole HEM)
				Bit 0: Auto Send Meter Report (for kWh) at the group time interval (Whole HEM)

103.label: Group 3 Reports
103.description:
Which reports need to send in group3. Format is as follows:
				Byte 1 (msb):
				Bit 7: Reserved
				Bit 6: Reserved
				Bit 5: Auto Send Meter Report (for kVar) at the group time interval (Clamp 3)
				Bit 4: Auto Send Meter Report (for kVar) at the group time interval (Clamp 2)
				Bit 3: Auto Send Meter Report (for kVar) at the group time interval (Clamp 1)
				Bit 2: Auto Send Meter Report (for KVah) at the group time interval (Clamp 3)
				Bit 1: Auto Send Meter Report (for KVah) at the group time interval (Clamp 2)
				Bit 0: Auto Send Meter Report (for KVah) at the group time interval (Clamp 1)
				Byte 2:
				Bit 7: Reserved
				Bit 6: Reserved
				Bit 5: Auto Send Meter Report (for A) at the group time interval (Clamp 3)
				Bit 4: Auto Send Meter Report (for A) at the group time interval (Clamp 2)
				Bit 3: Auto Send Meter Report (for A) at the group time interval (Clamp 1)
				Bit 2: Auto Send Meter Report (for V) at the group time interval (Clamp 3)
				Bit 1: Auto Send Meter Report (for V) at the group time interval (Clamp 2)
				Bit 0: Auto Send Meter Report (for V) at the group time interval (Clamp 1)
				Byte 3:
				Bit 7: Reserved
				Bit 6: Reserved
				Bit 5: Auto Send Meter Report (for kWh) at the group time interval (Clamp 3)
				Bit 4: Auto Send Meter Report (for kWh) at the group time interval (Clamp 2)
				Bit 3: Auto Send Meter Report (for kWh) at the group time interval (Clamp 1)
				Bit 2: Auto Send Meter Report (for Watt) at the group time interval (Clamp 3)
				Bit 1: Auto Send Meter Report (for Watt) at the group time interval (Clamp 2)
				Bit 0: Auto Send Meter Report (for Watt) at the group time interval (Clamp 1)
				Byte 4 (lsb):
				Bit 7: Reserved
				Bit 6: Reserved
				Bit 5: Auto Send Meter Report (for kVar) at the group time interval (Whole HEM)
				Bit 4: Auto Send Meter Report (for KVah) at the group time interval (Whole HEM)
				Bit 3: Auto Send Meter Report (for A) at the group time interval (Whole HEM)
				Bit 2: Auto Send Meter Report (for V) at the group time interval (Whole HEM)
				Bit 1: Auto Send Meter Report (for Watt) at the group time interval (Whole HEM)
				Bit 0: Auto Send Meter Report (for kWh) at the group time interval (Whole HEM)

111.label: Group 1 Interval
111.description: The interval of sending report group 1.

112.label: Group 2 Interval
112.description: The interval of sending report group 2

113.label: Group 3 Interval
113.description: The interval of sending report group 3

options.label: Reset to factory default setting and removed from the z-wave network
